parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up. From epi and airo; to raise up.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I take up, (b) I welcome, entertain, (c) I answer, (d) I suppose, imagine.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
